languages.text: "Зато могу сказать — в будущем мира Райкад Минорис я вижу только смерть, ничего кроме смерти. И это — очень недалекое будущее! Иными словами — надо делать ноги".
"But what I can say is that I only see death in Rykad Minoris's future. Death and nothing else. And I mean its immediate future! In other words, it's time to leg it."
languages.original_text: "Зато могу сказать — в будущем мира Райкад Минорис я вижу только смерть, ничего кроме смерти. И это — очень недалекое будущее! Иными словами — надо делать ноги".

traits.locale_text: "But what I can say is that I only see death in Rykad Minoris's future. Death and nothing else. And I mean its immediate future! In other words, it's time to scram."
"But what I can say is that I only see death in Rykad Minoris's future. Death and nothing else. And I mean its immediate future! In other words, it's time to scram."
"But what I can say is that I only see death in Rykad Minoris's future. Death and nothing else. And I mean its immediate future! In other words, it's time to leg it."
"But what I can say is that I only see death in Rykad Minoris's future. Death and nothing else. And I mean its immediate future! In other words, it's time to leg it."
"But what I can say is that I only see death in Rykad Minoris's future. Death and nothing else. And I mean its immediate future! In other words, it's time to leg it."
"But what I can say is that I only see death in Rykad Minoris's future. Death and nothing else. And I mean its immediate future! In other words, it's time to leg it."

languages.text: "Was ich jedoch sagen kann: Ich sehe in der Zukunft von Rykad Minoris nur Tod. Tod und sonst nichts. Und ich spreche von der unmittelbaren Zukunft! Mit anderen Worten, es wird Zeit zu verschwinden."
languages.original_text: "But what I can say is that I only see death in Rykad Minoris's future. Death and nothing else. And I mean its immediate future! In other words, it's time to leg it."

traits.locale_text: "Was ich jedoch sagen kann: Ich sehe in der Zukunft von Rykad Minoris nur Tod. Tod und sonst nichts. Und ich spreche von der unmittelbaren Zukunft! Mit anderen Worten, es wird Zeit zu verschwinden."

languages.text: « Mais ce que je peux dire, c'est que je ne vois que la mort dans l'avenir de Rykad Minoris. La mort et rien d'autre. Et je parle de son avenir immédiat ! Pour résumer, il est temps de filer. »
languages.original_text: "But what I can say is that I only see death in Rykad Minoris's future. Death and nothing else. And I mean its immediate future! In other words, it's time to leg it."

traits.locale_text: « Mais ce que je peux dire, c'est que je ne vois que la mort dans l'avenir de Rykad Minoris. La mort et rien d'autre. Et je parle de son avenir immédiat ! Pour résumer, il est temps de filer. »

languages.text: “但我可以说，我看到小莱卡德的未来只有死亡。除了死亡，别无其他，而且这就是很快会发生的事情！换句话说，我们是时候跑路了。”
languages.original_text: "But what I can say is that I only see death in Rykad Minoris's future. Death and nothing else. And I mean its immediate future! In other words, it's time to leg it."

traits.locale_text: “但我可以说，我看到小莱卡德的未来只有死亡。除了死亡，别无其他，而且这就是很快会发生的事情！换句话说，我们是时候跑路了。”

languages.text: 「だけどあたいに言えるのは、ライカド・ミノリスの未来には死しか見えないということ。死とそれ以外の何もない。そして、それは直近の未来を指している！言い換えれば、逃げる時が来たってことよ」
languages.original_text: "But what I can say is that I only see death in Rykad Minoris's future. Death and nothing else. And I mean its immediate future! In other words, it's time to leg it."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、私が言えることは、ライカド・ミノリスの未来には死しか見えないということ。死とそれ以外の何もない。そして、それは直近の未来を指している！言い換えれば、逃げる時がきたということ」

languages.text: «Pero lo que puedo decir es que solo veo muerte en el futuro de Rykad Minoris. Solo muerte. ¡Y me refiero a su futuro inmediato! En otras palabras, es hora de salir por patas».
languages.original_text: "But what I can say is that I only see death in Rykad Minoris's future. Death and nothing else. And I mean its immediate future! In other words, it's time to leg it."

traits.locale_text: «Pero lo que puedo decir es que solo veo muerte en el futuro de Rykad Minoris. Solo muerte. ¡Y me refiero a su futuro inmediato! En otras palabras, es hora de salir por patas».

languages.text: "Fakat şunu net diyebilirim ki Rykad Minoris için ölümden başka akıbet göremiyorum. Sırf ölüm var. Üstelik çok yakın bir gelecekte! Kısacası sıvışmalıyız."
languages.original_text: "But what I can say is that I only see death in Rykad Minoris's future. Death and nothing else. And I mean its immediate future! In other words, it's time to leg it."

traits.locale_text: "Fakat Rykad Minoris'in geleceğinde ölümden başka bir şey göremiyorum. Sırf ölüm var. Üstelik çok yakın bir gelecekte! Yani tez davranmalıyız."
